extensionAttribute.description: This will return: Check In, Check Out, or Blank for non-loaners.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/sh
FILE=/Users/Shared/Checked_In.txt FILE2=/Users/Shared/Checked_Out.txt
if test -f "$FILE" then
echo "<result>Available</result>" exit 0 elif test -f "$FILE2" then echo "<result>On loan</result>" exit 0 else
exit fi exit 0
